arabic.title: حتة من الخيال
text: ده اللي زيه مفيش منه يا قلبي

english.title: She's Out Of This World
text: My heart told me she's incredibly beautiful
She isn't falling for me, no signal and not even a word
Been languishing, she left me with a million questions
She should play hard to get
If she hides her love, let her hide it
My languish is sweet to my heart
My eyes hasn't seen like her
For years... and where did she come from?
What's that? And who? And where will she take me?

arabic.title: مفيش داعي
text: بنصالح بعض يومين و خصامنا سنين
أنا مش حملك طب أجيبلك صبر منين
لا نجحت معاك بالشدة ولا باللين

english.title: There's no need
text: for you to raise my pain
don't threaten to break up with me
because I'm going to accept it
for you to raise my pain
don't threaten to break up with me
it's me who's contemplating doing it
and it seems that we're not compatible
we make up for a couple of days and fight for years
I can't handle you.. how am I to get patience to put up with you?
I couldn't get through to you with harshness nor softness
and who are you bidding on leading me astray
they think that they know better

arabic.title: الممر
text: لسه جاي من وسط ليل العتمة ضي
يفرد جناح النور ويوهب لك حياة
تفتح عيونك على الأمل وتشوف مداه
وساعتها بس هتعرف انك لسه حي
ممر يخرج بيك من الليل لنهار
تبدأ طريقك حتى لو مشوار طويل
مين اللي قال انك معندكش اختيار
طول ما انت فيك الحيل حتقدر على الطريق
لسه جاي من وسط ليل العتمة ضي
يفرد جناح النور ويوهب لك حياة
تفتح عيونك على الأمل وتشوف مداه
وساعتها بس هتعرف انك لسه حي

english.title: The pass
text: There is an illumination still coming out from the darkness of the the night
Spreading its own wings of light and granting you life
So you open your eyes on hope and see, how far does it expand
That's when you will realize that you are still alive
That you still have a dream
And that you will keep going after it
is a pass that takes you out from night to day
So you start your passage no matter how long it is
Who said that you have no choice?
As long as you can stand you will be able to overcome this passage
You will be able to overcome this passage
There is an illumination still coming out from the darkness of the the night
Spreading its own wings of light and granting you life
So you open your eyes on hope and see, how far does it spread
That's when you will realize that you are still alive
That you still have a dream
And that you will keep going after it
And that you will keep going after it
